entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company known for its graphics processing units (GPUs) and other semiconductor products.

entities.name: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE
entities.description: Committee responsible for determining the number of shares subject to both PSUs and market-based PSUs that are eligible to vest based on achievement of pre-determined criteria.

entities.name: BOARD
entities.description: The Board of NVIDIA Corporation, responsible for overseeing the company and making key decisions including adjusting the percentage of earnings withheld for stock purchase.

relationships.relationship_description: The Compensation Committee determines the number of shares subject to PSUs and market-based PSUs eligible to vest based on criteria set by NVIDIA Corporation.
The Board oversees NVIDIA Corporation and makes key decisions such as adjusting the percentage of earnings withheld for stock purchase under the 2012 Plan.
